definition: A term used to refer to a married couple, typically used to describe both spouses collectively.

examples.german: Die Eheleute sind seit 20 Jahren verheiratet.
examples.english: The spouses have been married for 20 years.
The married couple has two children.

examples.english: The spouses are in a happy relationship.

examples.german: Die Eheleute teilen sich die Hausarbeit.
examples.english: The married couple shares the household chores.

examples.german: Die Eheleute haben sich scheiden lassen.
